wikipedia_page.main: Lawson Colin Chatterley (born 15 February 1945) is an English former professional football player and coach. He represented England at Youth level.

link_mentions.page: List of Grimsby Town F.C. players
List of Aston Villa F.C. seasons

response: * Lew Chatterley (born 1945), English football player and coach

He continued to be involved with the "Saints" helping Lew Chatterley coach the youth team between 1990 and 1995. He later worked for the Sports Council and the Hampshire F.A. in a sports development role.
